actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill authorizing a study to develop small hydroelectric projects for rural areas or communities.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to study the rehabilitation of former industrial sites, millraces, and other facilities with respect to conversion of communities. Authorizes the Secretary to furnish technical assistance to local public agencies for such rehabilitation.

titles.title: A bill authorizing a study to develop small hydroelectric projects for rural areas or communities.
